title: 292: Sam Darnold 360
itunes:title: 292: Sam Darnold 360
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks scout potential first overall selection, USC QB Sam Darnold. The guys scrutinize his game and pro potential (00:44) before they sit down with the people who have helped him throughout his career. DJ and Bucky speak to his high school coach Jaime Ortiz (15:12), his college coach Clay Helton (12:44), a former rival coach in Jim Mora (26:46), QB gurus Trent Dilfer (30:18) and Jordan Palmer (42:35) as well as Sam Darnold himself (51:48). Make sure to check out all seven MTS 360 episodes on the top players in the 2018 draft class.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
